mapper.sql: a.cWhCode as "cwhcode", a.cWhName as "cwhname", a.cInvCode as "cinvcode", a.cInvName as "cinvname", a.cInvStd as "cinvstd", a.cInvCCode as "cinvtype", a.iQuantity as "iquantity", a.cBatch as "cbatch", a.cMassUnit as "cMassUnit", a.iMassDates as "iMassDates", a.dMadeDate as "dMadeDate", a.iMassDate as "iMassDate", a.dVDate as "dVDate", a.cExpirationdate as "cExpirationdate", a.cPosCode as "cPosCode"
